name: Race For Your Life (itch) (benjaminkford)
description:
Theme: Death is only the beginning!

Race to the finish! You compete against computer players to get to the finish line first. There are several deadly obstacles on the way to the finish line, however... Can you make it out alive?

If you die, come back as a ghost to try and take out your competition!

Created by Ben Ford and James Daniel

https://gitlab.com/benjaminkford/race-for-your-life
